highlights: Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies
Maintain and extend current client- and server-side applications responsible for integration and business logic
Be involved in the global blockchain community—work on implementing and integrating the latest improvement proposals
Produce reports for the Management team
Plan, develop and manage web and mobile campaign and channel tracking
Collaborate with sales and marketing teams
Manage day-to-day operations of the cafe
Hire & Train employees
Nurture friendly relationships with customers to increase loyalty
Coordinate with vendors and order supplies & maintain records
Promote & sell products and services while exceeding sales forecasts
Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
Analyze the territory/market’s potential, track sales and status reports
Continuously improve through feedback
Educate customers on how products or services can benefit them financially & professionally
Maintaining positive business relationships to ensure future sales
Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products
Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends
Trained and managed a team of 3 prep-cooks and achieved significant improvements in their productivity
Mastered point-of-service computer system for automated order taking
Monitoring consistently the food quality and service quality of orders being served.
Successfully handled opening and closing of establishment
